newsitem.title: FRANCE: SWIMMING-PANKRATOV BREAKS 50 METRES BUTTERFLY WORLD RECORD.
newsitem.headline: SWIMMING-PANKRATOV BREAKS 50 METRES BUTTERFLY WORLD RECORD.

text.p: Russian Denis Pankratov set a 50 metres butterfly shortcourse swimming world record in 23.35 seconds at a World Cup meeting on Saturday.
Pankratov beat the previous best mark of 23.45 set by Briton Mark Foster in December 1995 in Sheffield, England.
